title: Box kite to swing wing
brief_description: A history of the Royal Australian Air Force from the original Australian Flying Corps to todays modern aircraft of Macchi jet trainers, medium range Hercules and Iriquois helicopters. Shows their operations in World Wars I and II, Korea, Malaya and Vietnam plus their peacetime operations.
